name: WingMan (CapBruno)
description:
WingMan
This game was developed during one week for the 2021.1 Brackey's Game Jam. The theme was Stronger Together.

In this shooter you'll control two ships on different sides of the screen. One with the arrow keys and the other with WASD. By synchronizing the movements of one ship with the movements of the other's shadow, you'll get a Power Up.

Play alone for a hard challenge on synchronizing you own movements
OR
Play together with someone to see how crazy things can get whe you try to follow your parter's moves.

Color is important here, so blue shots affect blue enemies, and red shots the red enemies. The purple shots can hit both. The waves are randomly generated with increasing dificulty.
......................................................................
HOW LONG CAN YOU SURVIVE?
......................................................................
---------- Controls:
-------------Blue Ship: W A S D
-------------Red Ship: Arrow Keys

If you wish to, you may download the game here as well
